
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/ymtianyu/p/18987112" title="发布于 2025-07-16 11:12">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Python列表字典高频用法大全｜新手必看避坑指南</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                    <div id="cnblogs_post_description" style="display: none">
        
        Python列表与字典高频用法指南，涵盖列表切片、推导式操作，字典安全访问与批量处理技巧，重点解析混合数据结构实战场景，提供可直接运行的商品库存系统代码模板，帮助开发者高效处理数据，减少常见错误。
    </div>
<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p style="font-size: 14px; color: rgba(136, 136, 136, 1); border-top: 1px dashed rgba(238, 238, 238, 1); padding-top: 15px; margin-top: 30px">摘要：详解Python列表与字典的10个高频使用场景，包括列表切片/推导式、字典安全访问/批量操作、混合数据结构处理技巧，提供可直接套用的商品管理系统代码模板，助你高效处理数据。</p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">有没有在数据处理时被各种报错搞得抓狂？<span style="color: rgba(255, 102, 0, 1)">调查显示87%的Python初学者都因不熟悉列表字典操作踩过坑！</span>✨</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">今天用最接地气的方式，帮你掌握这两个核心数据结构的<strong><span style="color: rgba(186, 55, 42, 1)">10个高频场景</span></strong>，从此告别无效加班👇</span></p>
<h2 style="font-size: 20px"><span style="font-family: 楷体; font-size: 24px"><strong>📌 本文目录</strong></span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">- 列表的5种神操作 </span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">- 字典的4个核心技巧 </span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">- 混合使用黑科技 </span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">- 完整代码模板</span></p>
<h2 style="font-size: 20px"><span style="font-family: 楷体; font-size: 24px"><strong>一、列表：你的万能数据收纳盒</strong></span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">想象列表是个<strong><span style="color: rgba(186, 55, 42, 1)">智能集装箱</span></strong>，能动态存放各种类型的数据：</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px">- 创建与增删：</span></strong></span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>my_list = [1, "文本", True] # 混合类型也OK
my_list.append(新元素) # 新增元素
my_list.pop(索引) # 移除最后元素</code></pre>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px">- 切片魔法：</span></strong></span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>my_list[1:5] #获取第2到5位
my_list[::2] #隔2取1</code></pre>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px">- 列表推导式：</span></strong></span><br><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">快速生成平方数：</span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>squares = [x**2 for x in range(10)]</code></pre>
<h2 style="font-size: 20px"><span style="font-family: 楷体; font-size: 24px"><strong>二、字典：快速检索的智能标签本</strong></span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">字典像<strong><span style="color: rgba(186, 55, 42, 1)">带索引的档案柜</span></strong>，用键值对高效管理数据：</span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>user = {"name": "小明", "age": 25, "skills": ["Python","SQL"]}</code></pre>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px">- 安全取值：</span></strong></span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>user.get("phone", "未知") # 键不存在返回默认值</code></pre>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px">- 批量操作：</span></strong></span><br><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">同时遍历键值：</span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>for key, value in user.items():</code></pre>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px">- 字典推导式：</span></strong></span><br><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">快速反转键值：</span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>{v:k for k,v in user.items()}</code></pre>
<h2 style="font-size: 20px"><span style="font-family: 楷体; font-size: 24px"><strong>三、混合使用实战技巧</strong></span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">当列表遇上字典，数据处理能力<strong><span style="color: rgba(186, 55, 42, 1)">指数级飙升</span></strong>：</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px">- 字典列表：用户信息表</span></strong></span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>users = [
&nbsp;&nbsp;{"id":101, "role":"admin"},
&nbsp;&nbsp;{"id":102, "role":"member"}
]</code></pre>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px">- 快速筛选管理员：</span></strong></span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>admins = [u for u in users if u["role"]=="admin"]</code></pre>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><strong><span style="font-size: 18px">- 多层嵌套访问：</span></strong></span></p>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code>users[0]["contact"]["email"] # 注意键是否存在！</code></pre>
<h2 style="font-size: 20px"><span style="font-family: 楷体; font-size: 24px"><strong>四、完整代码示例</strong></span></h2>
<pre class="language-python highlighter-hljs"><code># 创建商品库存系统
products = [
&nbsp;&nbsp;{"name": "鼠标", "stock": 42, "price": 89.9},
&nbsp;&nbsp;{"name": "键盘", "stock": 15, "price": 199}
]

# 自动补货预警
low_stock = [p["name"] for p in products if p["stock"] &lt; 20]
print(f"需补货商品：{', '.join(low_stock)}")

# 更新价格（避免KeyError写法）
for item in products:
&nbsp;&nbsp;if item.get("name") == "键盘":
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;item["price"] *= 0.8 # 打8折 ---</code></pre>
<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">喜欢本文？点赞👍收藏⭐，关注学习更多有用的知识，完善你的技能树！</span></p>
</div>
